text: Serbin is an unincorporated community in southwestern Lee County, Texas, United States. It is located about east of Austin.Serbin, Texas from TexasEscapes.com ==References== ==Other websites== *St. Paul Lutheran Church, Serbin, TX *Texas Wendish Heritage Society *Worldwide Wendish Connection *Views inside church Category:Unincorporated communities in Texas
